001import javax.swing.BoxLayout;
002import javax.swing.ImageIcon;
003import javax.swing.JButton;
004import javax.swing.JFrame;
005import javax.swing.JLabel;
006import javax.swing.JPanel;
007import javax.swing.JScrollPane;
008import javax.swing.JTextArea;
009import javax.swing.JTextField;
010
011import java.awt.BorderLayout;
012import java.awt.Dimension;
013import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
014import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
015import java.awt.event.WindowAdapter;
016import java.awt.event.WindowEvent;
017
018import java.net.URL;
019import java.util.Arrays;
020
021/**
022 * This class implements a simple graphical user interface with a 
023 * text entry area, a text output area and an optional image.
024 * 
025 * @author Michael Kolling
026 * @version 1.0 (Jan 2003) DB edited (2023)
027 */
028public class UserInterface implements ActionListener
029{
030    private GameEngine aEngine;
031    private JFrame     aMyFrame;
032    private JTextField aEntryField;
033    private JTextArea  aLog;
034    private JLabel     aImage;
035    private JButton[]   aBtsGo;
036    private String[] vDirections = {"North", "South", "West", "East", "Up", "Down"};
037
038    /**
039     * Construct a UserInterface. As a parameter, a Game Engine
040     * (an object processing and executing the game commands) is needed.
041     * @param pGameEngine  The GameEngine object implementing the game logic.
042     */
043    public UserInterface( final GameEngine pGameEngine )
044    {
045        this.aEngine = pGameEngine;
046        this.createGUI();
047    } // UserInterface(.)
048
049    /**
050     * Print out some text into the text area.
051     * @param pText The text to print.
052     */
053    public void print( final String pText )
054    {
055        this.aLog.append( pText );
056        this.aLog.setCaretPosition( this.aLog.getDocument().getLength() );
057    } // print(.)
058
059    /**
060     * Print out some text into the text area, followed by a line break.
061     * @param pText The text to print.
062     */
063    public void println( final String pText )
064    {
065        this.print( pText + "\n" );
066    } // println(.)
067
068    /**
069     * Show an image file in the interface.
070     * @param pImageName The name of the image file to display.
071     */
072    public void showImage( final String pImageName )
073    {
074        String vImagePath = "Images/" + pImageName; // to change the directory
075        URL vImageURL = this.getClass().getClassLoader().getResource( vImagePath );
076        if ( vImageURL == null )
077            System.out.println( "Image not found : " + vImagePath );
078        else {
079            ImageIcon vIcon = new ImageIcon( vImageURL );
080            this.aImage.setIcon( vIcon );
081            this.aMyFrame.pack();
082        }
083    } // showImage(.)
084
085    /**
086     * Enable or disable input in the entry field.
087     * @param pOnOff true to enable, false to disable.
088     */
089    public void enable( final boolean pOnOff )
090    {
091        this.aEntryField.setEditable( pOnOff ); // enable/disable
092        if ( pOnOff ) { // enable
093            this.aEntryField.getCaret().setBlinkRate( 500 ); // cursor blink
094            this.aEntryField.addActionListener( this ); // reacts to entry
095        }
096        else { // disable
097            this.aEntryField.getCaret().setBlinkRate( 0 ); // cursor won't blink
098            this.aEntryField.removeActionListener( this ); // won't react to entry
099            for (int i = 0; i < vDirections.length; i++) {
100                aBtsGo[i].removeActionListener(this);
101            }
102        }
103    } // enable(.)
104
105    /**
106     * Set up graphical user interface.
107     */
108    private void createGUI()
109    {
110        this.aMyFrame = new JFrame( "Le Secret du Chat" ); // change the title !
111        this.aEntryField = new JTextField( 34 );
112
113        this.aLog = new JTextArea();
114        this.aLog.setEditable( false );
115        JScrollPane vListScroller = new JScrollPane( this.aLog );
116        vListScroller.setPreferredSize( new Dimension(200, 200) );
117        vListScroller.setMinimumSize( new Dimension(100,100) );
118
119        this.aImage = new JLabel();
120
121        JPanel vEastPanel = new JPanel();// ==> place buttons add
122        vEastPanel.setLayout(new BoxLayout(vEastPanel, BoxLayout.Y_AXIS));//BoxLayout vertical
123        
124        this.aBtsGo = new JButton[vDirections.length];
125        for (int i = 0; i < vDirections.length; i++) {
126            aBtsGo[i] = new JButton(vDirections[i]);
127            vEastPanel.add(aBtsGo[i]);
128            aBtsGo[i].addActionListener(this);
129        }
130
131        JPanel vPanel = new JPanel();
132        vPanel.setLayout( new BorderLayout() ); // ==> only five places
133        vPanel.add( this.aImage, BorderLayout.NORTH );
134        vPanel.add( vListScroller, BorderLayout.CENTER );
135        vPanel.add( this.aEntryField, BorderLayout.SOUTH );
136        vPanel.add( vEastPanel, BorderLayout.EAST );
137
138        this.aMyFrame.getContentPane().add( vPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER );
139
140        // add some event listeners to some components
141        this.aEntryField.addActionListener( this );
142
143        // to end program when window is closed
144        this.aMyFrame.addWindowListener(
145            new WindowAdapter() { // anonymous class
146                @Override public void windowClosing(final WindowEvent pE)
147                {
148                    System.exit(0);
149                }
150        } );
151
152        this.aMyFrame.pack();
153        this.aMyFrame.setVisible( true );
154        this.aEntryField.requestFocus();
155    } // createGUI()
156
157    /**
158     * Actionlistener interface for entry textfield.
159     */
160    @Override public void actionPerformed( final ActionEvent pE ) 
161    {
162        // no need to check the type of action at the moment
163        // because there is only one possible action (text input) :
164        String vBtnName = pE.getActionCommand();
165        if (Arrays.asList(vDirections).contains(vBtnName)) {
166            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("go " + vBtnName.toLowerCase());
167        }else this.processCommand(); // never suppress this line
168    } // actionPerformed(.)
169
170    /**
171     * A command has been entered in the entry field.  
172     * Read the command and do whatever is necessary to process it.
173     */
174    private void processCommand()
175    {
176        String vInput = this.aEntryField.getText();
177        this.aEntryField.setText( "" );
178
179        this.aEngine.interpretCommand( vInput );
180    } // processCommand()
181} // UserInterface
